intro: Psychotria kratensis, commonly known as the Kratensian Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in areas with high humidity and warm climates. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and produces small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, well-drained soil and is often found in rainforests or undergrowth. The plant is also noted for its mild psychoactive properties due to the presence of certain alkaloids.
